title: Citi Named Best Treasury and Cash Management Provider in Latin America by Global Finance Magazine for Sixth Consecutive Year
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi has been named the number one Treasury and Cash Management Provider in Latin America by Global Finance magazine. For the sixth consecutive year, Citi has ranked as the top regional provider in the industry recognizing continued regional and category leadership. In addition, Citi was also named Best Global Cash Management Provider.
tag-1: Citi Named Best Treasury and Cash Management Provider in Latin America by Global Finance Magazine for Sixth Consecutive Year
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Citi has been named the number one Treasury and Cash Management Provider in Latin America by Global Finance magazine. For the sixth consecutive year, Citi has ranked as the top regional provider in the industry recognizing continued regional and category leadership. In addition, Citi was also named Best Global Cash Management Provider.
tag-4: According to Global Finance, its editors — with input from industry analysts, corporate executives and technology experts — selected the best providers of treasury and cash management services using a variety of subjective and objective criteria. Factors considered included: profitability, market share and reach, customer service, competitive pricing, product innovation, and the extent to which treasury and cash management banks have successfully differentiated themselves from their competitors.

tag-6: "Given the diverse economic conditions in the region, and the evolving business environment, our clients rely on us both for the insights to navigate macroeconomic, regulatory and technological changes as well as the local and regional capabilities to attend to their complex treasury needs," commented Fernando Iraola, Latin America Region Head, Treasury and Trade Solutions. "We have become the house bank for over 200 Shared Service Centers in Latin America from where our clients run their operations for the region. We continue to invest and grow in the 24 countries where Citi is present as we are committed to delivering the best client experience."
